entry.title: Comprehensive Guide: Correcting the Error When msi.dll Is Absent or Unavailable
entry.content:
Troubleshooting Mingwm10.dll File Not Detected: Comprehensive Fixes Unveiled

This DLL file is part of theMinGW (Minimalist GNU for Windows) development environment.

The mingwm10.dll error message could apply to any program or system that might utilize the file on any of Microsoft’soperating systems , includingWindows 11 ,Windows 10 ,Windows 8 ,Windows 7 ,Windows Vista ,Windows XP , and Windows 2000.

How to Fix Mingwm10.dll Errors

Follow these steps in the order they’re given below to try the simpler solutions first.

Do not download mingwm10.dll from a DLL download website. There are many reasons whydownloading a DLL file like that is a bad idea . If you need a copy of this file, it’s best to obtain it from its original, legitimate source.

  1. Restore mingwm10.dll from the Recycle Bin . The easiest possible cause of a “missing” mingwm10.dll file is that you’ve mistakenly deleted it.
    If you suspect this, but you’ve already emptied the Recycle Bin, you may be able to recover the file with afree file recovery program .
    Start Windows in Safe Mode to complete any of these steps if you’re unable to access Windows normally due to the error.
  2. Edit the Windows PATH variable and add the MinGW bin folder, likely this path (but check your installation to verify):
    C:\MinGW\bin
    If you know that MinGW isn’t installed, see Step 4 below.
  3. Reinstall the program that uses the mingwm10.dll file . If the error occurs when you use a particular program, reinstalling the program should replace the file.
    Try your best to complete this step. Reinstalling the program that provides this file, if possible, is a likely solution to this error.
  4. Download and install MinGW if the previous step didn’t fix the DLL error.
    When you open this program after the installation, you’ll use MinGW Installation Manager to installmingw32-base-bin . Mark the box next to that entry in the list, and then go toInstallation >Apply Changes to install it and, by extension, download mingwm10.dll.
  5. Search your computer for the mingwm10.dll file. If you find it (it’ll probably be in the same path shown above, in Step 2),copy it to the folder that contains the program that’s prompting the missing DLL error.
    8 Best Free File Search Tools
  6. Run a virus/malware scan of your entire system . Some mingwm10.dll errors could be related to a virus or other malware infection on your computer that has damaged the DLL file. It’s even possible that the mingwm10.dll error you’re seeing is related to a hostile program that’s masquerading as the file.
  7. Use System Restore to undo recent system changes . If you suspect that the mingwm10.dll error was caused by a change made to an important file or configuration,System Restore could solve the problem.
  8. Update the drivers for hardware devices that might be related to mingwm10.dll. If, for example, you’re receiving a “The file mingwm10.dll is missing” error when you play a 3D video game, try updating thedrivers for yourvideo card .
    The mingwm10.dll file may or may not be related to video cards—this was just an example. The key here is to pay very close attention to the context of the error and troubleshoot accordingly.
  9. Roll back a driver to a previously installed version if mingwm10.dll errors began after updating a particular hardware device’s driver.
  10. Install any available Windows updates . Manyservice packs and otherpatches replace or update some of the hundreds of Microsoft distributed DLL files on your computer. The mingwm10.dll file could be included in one of those updates, or a Windows update could be necessary for this DLL file to work properly.
  11. Test your memory and thentest your hard drive . I’ve left the majority of hardware troubleshooting to the last step, but your computer’smemory andhard drive are easy to test and are the most likely components that might cause mingwm10.dll errors as they fail.
    If the hardware fails any of your tests,replace the memory orreplace the hard drive as soon as possible.
  12. Repair your installation of Windows . If the individual mingwm10.dll file troubleshooting advice above is unsuccessful, performing a startup repair or repair installation should restore all Windows DLL files to their working versions.
  13. Use a free registry cleaner to repair mingwm10.dll related issues in the registry. A free registry cleaner program may be able to help by removing invalid mingwm10.dllregistry entries that might be causing the DLL error.
    We rarely recommend the use of registry cleaners. They’re included here as a “last resort” attempt before the destructive step coming up next.
  14. Perform a clean installation of Windows . This will erase everything from thehard drive and install a fresh copy of Windows. If none of the steps above correct the mingwm10.dll error, this should be your next course of action.
    All the information on your hard drive will be erased during this step. Make sure you’ve made the best attempt possible to fix the mingwm10.dll error using a troubleshooting step prior to this one.
  15. Troubleshoot for a hardware problem if any mingwm10.dll errors persist. After a clean installation of Windows, your DLL problem can only be hardware related.

With Screensaver Wonder you can easily make a screensaver from your own pictures and video files. Create screensavers for your own computer or create standalone, self-installing screensavers for easy sharing with your friends. Together with its sister product Screensaver Factory, Screensaver Wonder is one of the most popular screensaver software products in the world, helping thousands of users decorate their computer screens quickly and easily.

Need More Help?

If you’re not interested in fixing this problem yourself, see How Do I Get My Computer Fixed? for a full list of your support options, plus help with everything along the way like figuring out repair costs, getting your files off, choosing a repair service, and a lot more.

Causes of Mingwm10.dll Errors

Mingwm10.dll errors are caused by situations that lead to the removal or corruption of the mingwm10DLL file .

In some cases, mingwm10.dll errors could indicate aregistry problem, a virus or malware issue, or even ahardware failure.


WPS Office Premium ( File Recovery, Photo Scanning, Convert PDF)–Yearly

There are several ways mingwm10.dll errors can show up on your computer. Here are some of the more common error messages you might see:

  • Mingwm10.dll Not Found
  • This application failed to start because mingwm10.dll was not found. Re-installing the application may fix this problem
  • Cannot find [PATH]\mingwm10.dll
  • The file mingwm10.dll is missing
  • Cannot start [APPLICATION]. A required component is missing: mingwm10.dll. Please install [APPLICATION] again

These error messages might appear while using or installing certain programs, or when Windows starts or shuts down. The context of the error is an important piece of information that will be helpful while solving the problem.

entry.title: Game Save Revolution: Adding and Utilizing Extra Storage with Your Xbox One's HDD
entry.content:
Game Save Revolution: Adding and Utilizing Extra Storage with Your Xbox One’s HDD

Close

On Xbox One, you can’t swap the built-in hard drive for a new one, but you_can_ do something even better: use an additional external hard drive . This article explains the requirements and how to do it.

Requirements for Adding an HDD to Your Xbox One

When you add a hard drive to your Xbox One, you get to use the 500GB internal drive, plus up to two additional external USB HDDs with as many terabytes of storage as you can afford to hold all of your games.

You have a wide range of options for external HDDs on the Xbox One. You can use any HDD that is:

  1. USB 3.0
  2. At least 256GB and
  3. At least 5400rpm.

From there, any brand and any size will work. Faster read speeds and higher capacity cost more, of course. Solid-state drives can offer the best performance but cost more. You can get a decent 5400rpm 1TB external USB 3.0 HDD for around $60.

Terabytes, Gigabytes, & Petabytes: How Big Are They?

How to Use an External HDD with Xbox One

Using an external HDD is surprisingly simple. They are USB-powered, so no need to plug them into an A/C outlet or anything.

Just plug the USB cable into the USB port on the back of your Xbox One, and you’re good to go.

The drive will need to be formatted before you can use it but the Xbox ONE will do that for you; just let the fast process unfold and then start playing.

The drives are usually very small, so just tuck them somewhere out of the way (but try to give them plenty of ventilation as they can get hot).

How HDDs Improve Performance

Here is something interesting about using an external HDD on Xbox One: It can actually load games faster than the internal drive because it can transfer data more quickly.

The same 5400rpm speed that the internal drive uses will actually load games a little faster from an external drive.

Opt for a 7200rpm external drive or a solid-state drive, and games can load even quicker. We’re talking_many_ seconds of faster load times.

Do You Really Need an External HDD?

While there are definite benefits to using an external HDD with your Xbox One, don’t misunderstand and think it is a necessity or requirement or anything. Consider which games you’re going to be playing, and how many, and decide from there if you need an external drive.

We never would have made it through the first two years of the Xbox One’s life without an external drive, but most people aren’t going to be playing dozens of games in just a few months.

Still, you may fill up the internal HDD just with Game Pass titles after a while, so looking into an external HDD isn’t a bad idea.

Seagate External Hard Drive.

Seagate

Bottom Line

You can certainly get by with the 500GB internal drive by deleting old games and reinstalling them when you want to play them, but if you have to redownload large games, it can be a real pain depending on your Internet speed. An external drive can save you time and trouble.

The Best External Hard Drives of 2024

entry.title: Troubleshooting Tips to Correct Hal.dll Errors in Your Windows XP System
entry.content:
Troubleshooting Tips for Non-Responsive Keyboards - Learn How to Restore Functionality

This article explains how to fix an unresponsive keyboard. This guide covers built-in keyboards as well as wired and wireless keyboards.

The Best Ergonomic Keyboards of 2024

9 Ways to Fix the Problem

A number of issues could be causing the keyboard to stop typing. Here are some solutions we’ve seen work:

  1. Make sure you have the correct text field selected. Click directly in the section where you want to type, then try typing again.
    This is an easy mistake to make. Watch where you’ve clicked to ensure the keystrokes are sent there. The app must be in focus or what you type won’t show up in the right place.
  2. Close and reopen the app you’re trying to type in. Temporary software glitches happen all the time, and restarting the program is the fastest way around them.
  3. Turn on the keyboard if it has an on/off switch. If it’s on and is battery-powered, check the batteries or ensure it’s at least somewhat charged.
  4. Check the keyboard’s connection to your computer. We recommend doing the following, depending on the keyboard you have:
    • For a USB keyboard, unplug it and plug it back in.
    • For a wireless one, detach the USB dongle for a few seconds and then reattach it.
    • Toggle Bluetooth off on your PC and then switch it back on, making sure your keyboard connects after a few seconds. You may need to pair the keyboard again if it doesn’t.
    • Plug the keyboard or dongle into a different USB port.
    • Try a different cable if it uses a detachable USB cable.
    • Try it on a different computer. If it doesn’t work there, it’s likely dead.
      5 Things to Consider When Buying a Computer Keyboard
  5. Restart your computer . If your computer is responsive, use the mouse to restart it. If it’s not responsive,fix your frozen computer first.
  6. Clean the keyboard. Dirt stuck under the keys can keep them from working correctly. This could be why some keys work but others don’t.
    If you find sticky residue under the keys, it may have failed due to spilled liquid. Cleaning may help, and you can sometimes evensave a laptop keyboard after a spill , but it’s also possible it’s been permanently damaged.
  7. Open Device Manager and enable the keyboard. This is relevant if you’ve taken that step todisable your keyboard in Windows . Some people do this for laptop keyboards, and you’ll probably remember if you did that, but it doesn’t hurt to check.
  8. Update your drivers . A driver installation is almost always necessary if you have an advanced keyboard that hasn’t been able to type right out of the box. However, even older keyboards that used to type just fine could use a driver update if the existing one was deleted or needs a bug fix.
    If your keyboard stopped working after an update, you may need toroll back your driver instead.
  9. Disable sticky and filter keys . If your keyboard seems to work but is behaving unexpectedly and doesn’t type the keys you’re pressing, you may be able to fix it by disabling sticky, filter, and toggle keys.

Why the Keyboard Quit Working

Some of the reasons a keyboard might be unresponsive include:

  • The computer is frozen : If the computer or an app is locked up, you won’t be able to type.
  • The keyboard is disconnected : The keyboard may have been unplugged, ran out of batteries, or the wireless connection disrupted.
  • The intended text field isn’t selected : If the text field you’re trying to type in has been deselected, your keyboard will either not type or it will be typing somewhere off-screen (so it appears to not work).
  • Software or driver problems : Your keyboard driver or some other software issue may have caused it to quit working.

The Best Bluetooth Keyboards for Smartphones in 2024

Bryan Natanael / Unsplash

FAQ

  • What do I do if my laptop keyboard won’t type?
    It’s unlikely that your laptop’s keyboard is suffering from a connection problem since it’s built into the system, but it is possible that thekeyboard lock may have accidentally been turned on. The steps to unlock a locked laptop keyboard can differ depending on the make and model, but look for a function key with a keyboard icon and press it to see if that solves the problem. If not, look up the process for unlocking your specific laptop model’s keyboard and try that.
  • What should I do if my Chromebook keyboard stops typing?
    Restart your Chromebook and try typing again. The issue could also be caused by an error with your using account, so sign out and sign back in withGuest Mode to test the keyboard again. If the keyboard works in Guest Mode, delete the problem account and reconnect it.

Experience Exclusive Luxury in Electronics without Breaking the Bank

In This Article

  • Nespresso Coffee & Espresso Machine
  • Mode Designs Keyboard
  • Revolution Touchscreen Toaster
  • Soulaca Smart Magic Mirror
  • Dyson Solarcycle Morph Floor Light
  • Hexcal Studio
  • Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H95 Headphones
  • iPhone 15 Pro
  • Vespera Smart Telescope
  • Dell Ultrasharp 32 6K Monitor

We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. If you click on the links we provide, we may receive compensation. Learn more . Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.

Today, (almost) everything has a cool tech aspect to it, including toasters and lights. But what’s really worth the cost when it comes down to affordability? We looked at cost, use, features, and more to develop our list of tech that’s luxurious but still relatively affordable whether you’re gifting yourself or someone else. It’s time to get your wallet out!

Best for Caffeine-Fueled Days: Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe Coffee and Espresso Machine

Nespresso.

Coffee lovers will flip over this espresso machine that includes a frother to add a smoothly textured milk froth to your cup.

Brew espresso, iced coffee, mocha, latte, or a quick cappuccino for an upgraded cuppa from a slimly designed machine that is also easy to bring along when traveling. Coffee lovers on our team give this a double thumbs-up!

$199 at Amazon

Best for Impressing Envious Co-workers: Mode Envoy Anthracite-themed Keyboard

Mode

Next to your phone, your keyboard is likely the piece of tech you physically interact with the most. Why shouldn’t it be the best?

This custom keyboard from Mode Designs isn’t your father’s mechanical keyboard: It offers an ultra-quiet keystroke while still providing the classic mechanical touch your fingertips crave.

The Envoy comes in classic white with grey accents, silent switches, and beautiful keycaps. Because it’s customizable, you can always change each piece to make your Envoy a one-of-a-kind masterpiece. You’ll be a keyboard enthusiast before you know it!

$368 at Modedesigns.com

Best for Toasting Your Day Any Way You Want: Revolution Touchscreen Toaster

PaperScan Professional： PaperScan Scanner Software is a powerful TWAIN & WIA scanning application centered on one idea: making document acquisition an unparalleled easy task for anyone.

Revolution

Broiled-bread lovers will salivate over this ridiculously easy-to-use touchscreen toaster.

Come on: Who doesn’t need 3 toasting modes, 7 toasting shades, and options for fresh and frozen foods?

There’s a large, full-color touchscreen display to help you zero in on the exact bread and setting you prefer. Plus, the whole thing is slim enough to fit in a drawer.

It boasts an ‘InstaGLO’ heating system that allows it to heat up quickly and produce toasted items with crunchy outsides and soft insides.

This version includes a panini press to make all the melty, yummy sandwiches you like. Yeah. We gotta go; we’re making hot sandwiches today!

$399 at Amazon

Best for Multi-Tasking While You Surf the Web or Watch TV: Soulaca Smart Magic Mirror

Soulaca

Yep, there’s a mirror that doubles as a TV. The extra add that makes this affordable luxury? It’s water-resistant, so you can use it around pools, kitchens, bathrooms, and other wet areas.

Realistically, who doesn’t need a TV in the bathroom these days? We’re all on the go so much that getting information and entertainment wherever we are is practically a must in today’s world.

This mirror/TV combo offers voice control, an air mouse, and AI technology to help you control your connected home and enjoy your favorite shows at the same time.

Oh, need a mirror for a minute? Just turn the TV off, and voila! There you are, peering at your lovely self. Well played, Soulaca, well played.

$519 at Walmart

Best for Lighting Up Your World: Dyson Solarcycle Morph Floor Light

Dyson

This is THE lamp you need to light up your life.

Anyone who works from home or spends a lot of time in a location where light conditions change throughout the day will appreciate this sleek, modernly 2@designed floor lamp.

This lamp is true to its name: It really does morph into a new light depending on your needs. Just want a simple glow? The magnetic touch-glide docking system flips the lamp into a new position to create a comforting orange glow on the lamp’s stem.

Need a task light? No problem: A focused, powerful light will appear. Need some blue light? Yeah, it’s got that covered, too. Ambient light? Of course.

Overall, this is a truly intelligent lamp with auto-adjusting light features that combine with a motion sensor and an automatic off option. Add an integrated USB-C charger plus an app to control the light from wherever you are, and you’ll be so spoiled you won’t ever want to use a regular lamp again.

$849 at Best Buy

Best for Making Your Desk Look (and Feel) Organized: Hexcal Studio

Jet Profiler for MySQL, Enterprise Version： Jet Profiler for MySQL is real-time query performance and diagnostics tool for the MySQL database server. Its detailed query information, graphical interface and ease of use makes this a great tool for finding performance bottlenecks in your MySQL databases.

Hexcal

Got a case of the cord clutters? Simplify your workspace with the Hexcal Studio.

Think of this as a cool new monitor stand (kinda) that hides away all those cords (up to 14) and includes an immersive, non-direct lighting system that—get this!—an astounding 1280 possible light configurations.

It’s all below-eye-level task lighting, too, so you just get the light without eye fatigue.

This is the way to declutter and organize where you work while managing up to 14 electronic devices, along with all of their cables. You’ve got to see the Hexcal Studio to see what your productivity has been missing.

$899 at Hexcal.com

Best for Rocking Out: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H95 Headphones

Bang & Olufsen

For the ultimate in luxury headphones, take a good look at Bang & Olufsen’s Beoplay H95 Headphones.

Besides the bangin’ audio that Bang & Olufsen is known for, you’ll get 4 built-in microphones for crystal-clear voice performance on every call. It also has noise-canceling features to ensure you don’t miss a thing.

Other super-fancy features include titanium drivers with neodymium magnets that improve sound precision and low-frequency response; lambskin leather and memory foam for a soft, comfortable fit on the ears; and 38 hours of playback on a single charge.

The H95s come in several colors and with a pretty, matching aluminum carry case. Our favorite color option? Gold. Because if we’re going to fork over all our pennies for these headphones, we’re going to be sure_everyone_ notices them.

$995 at Amazon

Best Phone for Making Android Users Want to Switch: iPhone 15 Pro

Lifewire/Molly McLaughlin

“Gorgeous, zippy, and worth the upgrade ,” raves our in-house smartphone reviewer, a die-hard Android fan. If even_she_ is salivating over the iPhone 15 Pro, you know it’s a phone to seriously consider purchasing, regardless of price.

With the new USB-C port, Ceramic Shield coating, and lightweight titanium body, this iPhone is one of the best-designed versions Apple has produced in a long time. If you’ve ever thought about getting a new iPhone, this is the time to spring for one.

The trio of cameras on the iPhone 15 Pro include a 48MP primary camera, an ultra-wide lens, and a 3X zoom lens. They’re a photographer’s dream, but even if that’s not your thing, the A17 Pro chip makes this phone a standout.

Apple calls it the fastest chip ever on any smartphone, and it could be right. It’s built with a new manufacturing technique that offers increased efficiency and much better performance.

The bottom line: If you’re in the market for a new smartphone, the iPhone 15 Pro is a high-performing beauty that will last a long time. Apple is even offering a payment plan, so why not make the move now?

$998 at Apple

Best Way to Watch the Night Skies: Vespera

Billed as the world’s lightest observation station, fans of the night sky will love Vespera.

This portable telescope includes a Sony CMOS built-in sensor and a 50mm quadruplet lens made with lanthanum glass to make photographing deep sky objects near effortless for anyone.

Here’s how it works: Instead of viewing the dark skies through an eyepiece on a telescope, the eyepiece is substituted with a mobile application that lets Vespera send what it sees to your phone using GPS, star pattern recognition, and astrometry to calibrate itself.

Yes, it’s spelled right!Astrometry is a branch of astronomy that uses precise measurements of the stars (where they are and how they move) to plot and understand what’s happening in the night skies over Earth.

Then, you view the skies on your smartphone (or another mobile device) instead of through a telescope.

It’s light (less than 11 pounds) and folds into a small bundle that can easily drop into a backpack or large bag.

See something you like? Snap a pic with the phone and watch for the next celestial moment that captures your imagination or curiosity.

Going to the hills? The desert? The backyard? Grab your smartphone and the Vespera, and head out to capture the stars tonight! We’ll be right behind you (to sneak some peeks, too!)

$1,499 at Amazon

Best View to Clarify Your Digital World: Dell Ultrasharp 32 6K Monitor

Dell

It’s often said when buying something, buy the best. This Dell Ultrasharp monitor is more than a fancy display. With a resolution of more than one display, ports to connect a ton of devices, and an incredibly sharp screen, it will be the best monitor you have ever used.

At a diagonal size of 32 inches, this tiltable monitor includes anti-glare, 3H hard coating, 223 pixels per inch, 6K resolution, and response times of 5 ms (gray-to-gray fast) and 8 ms (gray-to-gray normal).

You don’t even need to get a webcam because it’s got a 4K one built right into it.

When you’ve gotta have the absolute clearest, fastest view, this monitor is the way to go.

$2,562 at Dell

Hilarious Tricks & Jokes: Top iPhone & iPad Stunts to Surprise Your Buddies

It doesn’t need to be April Fool’s Day to pull off a good prank. These ideas are designed for people with aniPhone oriPad , especially if they keep their device unlocked so you can mess with the settings.

01

of 06

Use Siri to Set Reminders, Alarms, Events, Etc.

metamorworks / Getty Images

While setting a reminder or an alarm to go off at a strange time might not sound like the greatest prank to pull on someone, there’s a good reason why it’s first on the list: You can do it to almost any iPhone or iPad.

Siri is the voice recognition personal assistant for iOS and, by default, it’s turned on even when the device is on the lock screen. So, your intended victim can have their iPhone protected by apasscode and you can still pull a prank on them.

Activate Siri by holding down the side button (or Home button if applicable) and give her a command. One funny prank is to create a string of reminders, such as:

  • “Remind me at 9 a.m. to check my tire pressure.”
  • “Remind me at 9:10 a.m. to really check my tire pressure.”
  • “Remind me at 9:15 a.m. that tire pressure is the gateway to safe driving.”

You can also use Siri to set an alarm at a way-too-early time or schedule a fake meeting. Just remember, this prank could be pulled on you too, so you might want to turn Siri off while on the lock screen .

02

of 06

PDF application, powered by AI-based OCR, for unified workflows with both digital and scanned documents.

The Screenshot Background

Credit: Justin Sullivan / Staff Editorial #: 457316526

The screenshot prank involvestaking a screenshot of the home screen andusing it as the wallpaper for the lock screen . This change can cause your unsuspecting victim to think the iPad or iPhone is ready to use, but all the taps in the world won’t open an app until they slide to unlock.

03

of 06

The Screenshot Home Screen

Karl Tapales/Getty Images

This one is similar to the screenshot background.

  • Start by taking a screenshot of the first page of apps on the Home screen.
  • Next, move every app from the first screen to any other page of apps.
  • Then, add the screenshot as the home screen background.
  • Last, delete the screen shot from the Photos app to keep your target from figuring out your prank.

The result is a Home screen full of apps that won’t launch because they are actually part of the wallpaper. The victim can still launch docked apps and can still move to a different page to launch an app, but even moving to a different page gives the iPhone or iPad a broken effect when the original apps seem to stay in place.

04

of 06

The Blue Screen of Death

This one is funnier if you’re targeting an IT professional or anyone that knows a bit about computers. The famed “Blue Screen of Death” is the error screen Windows gives when the operating system crashes.

Having the Blue Screen of Death appear on an Apple device may or may not trick someone who knows a thing or two about computers. But, at the very least, it should draw a good laugh.

Select this photo for a blue screen that can be sized so it doesn’t overfill the screen.

05

of 06

Invert the Colors

MEHAU KULYK/SCIENCE PHOTO LIBRARY / Getty Images

iOS’s accessibility options can be a goldmine for pranksters. Inverting the colors can make the iPad look all out of whack with no easy way to put it back to normal. Unless your target has really experimented with all the iPad settings, they probably won’t figure it out.

The funny part is that this adjustment inverts all colors, not just those in the user interface, so if they go into the Photos app, all of their pictures will have inverted colors.

Make it funnier by suggesting theyreboot the device because that solves most problems. Of course, rebooting won’t do anything, but the process of doing it will make the issue seem even more serious.

06

of 06

Put the Device in Zoom Mode

Westend61 / Getty Images

The iPhone and iPad’s accessibility options also have a zoom mode, which is great for those with vision problems and those who want to have a laugh at a friend’s expense.

After turning zoom mode on, you can use it tozoom in on the iPhone or iPad and leave it that way for your friend to find.
